queries.query: large plant creature that can regenerate and create fruit upon death
queries.variant: big plant monster that produces fruits when it dies and regenerates health

queries.query: plant creature linked to a tree and can only regenerate if its vine is intact
queries.variant: plant monster connected to a nearby tree that loses regeneration if cut

queries.variant: chaotic neutral plant being with excellent constitution prefers hard terrains

queries.query: creature with natural armor that resembles a tree and can absorb damage
queries.variant: monster with natural defense that looks like a tree and can take hits

queries.variant: plant being that offers heroes' feast benefits and thrives in the woods
